input.sentences: we cheered loudly for the marathon running through our city .
we were disappointing at the trash they left behind though .
cousin [female] made it to the top 500 .
by next year we should have an even bigger race .
output.sentences: There were dancers at the race today.
There were a lot of runners who just threw their cups in the stret.
There were a lot of runners that dressed up.
My cousin ran next to me.
And we finally made it to the end.
